Preserves number of counts.\n\n    Args:\n        matrix_in (array, double): Array of inbound counts to be smoothed\n        E_array (array, double): Array with energy calibration of matrix_in, in\n                                 lower-bin-edge calibration\n        fwhm (double or array of doubles): The full-width-half-maximums\n        abs_or_rel (str): fhwm given absolute, or relative in %\n                          relative: fwhm = fwhm_divE/100 * E_array\n        axis: The axis along which smoothing should happen.\n              Can be either of (0, 'Eg', 'x'), (1, 'Ex', 'y')\n    ";

 122:                               fwhm,
 123:                               axis="Eg"):
 124:     """ Smooth a matrix with a Gaussian
 125: 
 126:     Function which smooths an array of counts by a Gaussian
 127:     of full-width-half-maximum FWHM. Preserves number of counts.
 128: 
 129:     Args:
 130:         matrix_in (array, double): Array of inbound counts to be smoothed
 131:         E_array (array, double): Array with energy calibration of matrix_in, in
 132:                                  lower-bin-edge calibration
 133:         fwhm (double or array of doubles): The full-width-half-maximums
 134:         abs_or_rel (str): fhwm given absolute, or relative in %
 135:                           relative: fwhm = fwhm_divE/100 * E_array
 136:         axis: The axis along which smoothing should happen.
 137:               Can be either of (0, 'Eg', 'x'), (1, 'Ex', 'y')
 138:     """
